<template>
  <v-app-bar :elevation="2">
    <template v-slot:prepend>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon
        @click="openDrawer"
        icon="mdi-menu"
      ></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
    </template>
    <v-app-bar-title
      class="text-center"
      v-text="isAuthenticated ? user : 'todo'"
    ></v-app-bar-title>
    <template v-slot:append>
      <v-btn
        :icon="darkMode ? 'mdi-weather-night' : 'mdi-white-balance-sunny'"
        :color="darkMode ? 'primary' : 'warning'"
        @click="changeTheme"
      ></v-btn>
    </template>
  </v-app-bar>
  <NavDrawer ref="navDrawer"></NavDrawer>
</template>
<script>
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";
import NavDrawer from "@/components/NavDrawer.vue";
import { mapState } from "vuex";

export default {
  name: "AppBar",
  components: {
    NavDrawer,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      theme: useTheme(),
      darkMode: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    changeTheme() {
      this.darkMode = !this.darkMode;
      this.theme.global.name = this.darkMode ? "darkTheme" : "lightTheme";
    },
    openDrawer() {
      this.$refs.navDrawer.openDrawer();
    },
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(["isAuthenticated", "user"]),
  },
};
</script>
